Description: Company DescriptionOxygen Aerospace is a DCA authorized aviation company located in Sharjah Emirate, United Arab Emirates. We specialize in mid-life narrow-body commercial and business aircraft sales as well as new and after-market aircraft parts supply. We deal in civil aircraft trading and parts supply with a focus on aviation solutions tailored to meet our clients' unique needs.Role DescriptionThis is a full-time on-site role for a Sales Executive. The Sales Executive will be responsible for generating new business, managing existing accounts, and cultivating relationships with customers. They will be responsible for identifying customer needs and providing solutions through effective communication, presentation, and negotiation. The Sales Executive will also be responsible for developing sales strategies and achieving revenue goals.Skills
Skills:
Execute all sales tasks for the assigned region or clientsâ€™ accounts, including Proposals, Sales Orders, invoicing, Packings, and Customs. etc.
Identify and target sales lead
Contributing to the development of marketing strategies.
Build and maintain customer relationships
Meeting/realization of sales targets
Handle the full spectrum of shipping Customs Clearance Documentation
Liaise and coordinate with forwarders, shipping companies, and third-party logistics providers, including handling order processing, fulfillment, and timely delivery to customers including storage, packaging, and tagging of goods supplied.
Communicate status of Orders, and shipping/receiving activities to management and business units, as necessary.

Data.Company Industry: Aviation Support Services; Sales Outsourcing; Retail & Wholesale
